live_updates: Work still continues in the area to get all services back online.  We thank you for your patience.
The local power company is still working on several downed lines in the area. Please follow this link for power outage updates from BC Hydro's Outage list (bchydro.com)
Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
Several areas have had services restored. Technicians continue to bring remaining areas back online.

We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected areas. Local power companies will be working overnight and into the morning, and once power is restored, services in these areas should begin working.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54859.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland, and on Vancouver Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54859.title: Nov 6 - Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
